short_summary: To submit an expression of interest for a potential lease of space that meets the following criteria
description: the leasing department wants to leas a space starting June 1, 2024, that is approximately 150 square meters, has a begginning space one week before so that PSPC may prepare all space for occupancy and it must have a certain characteristics and a certain location
date_posted: OTG bedroom Dr S Fury Rd
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: Lease and Rental of Property or Building**
===========================================================

**Solicitation Number:** 81002758
**Reference Number:** cb-8968-99010907
**Publication Date:** September 15, 2023
**Tender Closing Date and Time:** October 6, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Title:** Lease of Space for the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) in Iqaluit, Nunavut Territory

The Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites interested registered Inuit firms and other parties to express their interest in renting space in Iqaluit, Nunavut Territory. The proposed lease should meet the following requirements:

**Lease Components:**

- Minimum lease term of 10 years, commencing on or about June 1, 2024
- Approximately 150 usable square meters (150 m2) of contiguous warehouse space
- Two energized parking spaces
- The proposed space should comply with all requirements contained in PSPC's Standards for Leased Accommodation

**Physical Characteristics:**

- One grade level overhead door, minimum size of 2.13 m wide x 2.74 m high (7’ x 9’)
- One man door for pedestrian access
- Minimum unobstructed warehouse ceiling height of 3.05 m (10') throughout
- The space must be heated or capable of being heated
- The space must have all basic utilities, including telecommunications, water, sewer, gas, and electricity

**Location:**

- The proposed space must be located in the city of Iqaluit, Nunavut Territory

**Submission Requirements:**

- Potential lessees will be required to provide information, including the dimensions of the proposed space, and evidence that the proposed space meets the above requirements
- PSPC may visit or inspect the proposed space upon reasonable notice

**Contact Information:**

- Sheena Collins
- Procurement Officer
- Public Services and Procurement Canada
- Phone: (780) 907-4786
- Email: sheena.collins@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca

**Bid Documents:**

- Canada Buy and Sell (CanBeSell) Web System: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8968/20230829---eoi-ad-en---in.pdf>
- Canada Buy and Sell (CanBeSell)
